thread.title: Green Valley Gardeners: Caring for the holiday Christmas cactus
thread.title_full: Green Valley Gardeners: Caring for the holiday Christmas cactus

author: Mary Kidnocker For the Green Valley News
title: Green Valley Gardeners: Caring for the holiday Christmas cactus
text:
Much of the year, Christmas cactus (Schlumbergera) is rather insignificant, but with proper care it can become an annual Christmas star.
Hybridizing has brought about a wide variety of flower colors, including pink, red, white, orange, purple and cream. Additionally, its cascading stems make it a favorite for hanging baskets and plant stands.
